title: Ticket #4580: Fix pslot startd RANK preemption
description:
The commits made for #3667 have several shortcomings:

  1. Failure to include required schedd code patches, thus startd RANK simply cannot work properly on pslots.

  2. The changes in the negotiator only look at aggregation of cpu/memory/disk, and thus fail to consider extra user-defined resources. This could create very difficult to debug situations for the administrator.

  3. The design document needs to be enhanced to explicitly answer questions like how does the schedd know when all the preemptions of dynamic slots are complete such that a (larger) dynamic slot can now be created. A sequence of events in the design document would be welcome.

  4. Some new knobs were added in the code, but they are a) not added into the param table, b) not documented in the manual, c) not discussed or mentioned in the design document.
remarks:
2014-Oct-01 12:46:41 by tim:
Still need documentation for knobs and inclusion in the param table. Pushing forward to 8.2.4 to complete this work.

2015-Jun-10 14:21:47 by tannenba:
Resolving this ticket, as the concerns mentioned above are dealt with as part of #4942.
